Sentencas: An extensive thermodynamic analysis on different versions of external reforming of methane for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) has been carried out in this paper.
Titulo: THERMODYNAMIC ANALYSIS OF METHANE FUELED SOLID OXIDE FUEL-CELL SYSTEM

Sentencas: Steam reforming, partial oxidation and exhaust gas reforming have been compared.
Titulo: THERMODYNAMIC ANALYSIS OF METHANE FUELED SOLID OXIDE FUEL-CELL SYSTEM

Sentencas: As a theoretical tool, an electrochemical generator was used, where the reactions involved in the reformer, in the fuel cell and in the exhaust gas sections have been separately analysed.
Titulo: THERMODYNAMIC ANALYSIS OF METHANE FUELED SOLID OXIDE FUEL-CELL SYSTEM

Sentencas: Equilibrium calculations were performed in the temperature range 1000 - 1400 K assuming different oxidized/reduced component ratios at the inlet and at the outlet of the electrochemical section.
Titulo: THERMODYNAMIC ANALYSIS OF METHANE FUELED SOLID OXIDE FUEL-CELL SYSTEM

Sentencas: On this basis the results pointed out that the most efficient way to feed a SOFC is by exhaust gas reforming, while the partial oxidation efficiencies show lower values, especially at high temperatures.
Titulo: THERMODYNAMIC ANALYSIS OF METHANE FUELED SOLID OXIDE FUEL-CELL SYSTEM

Sentencas: The heat flows of different sections of the SOFC have been also considered.
Titulo: THERMODYNAMIC ANALYSIS OF METHANE FUELED SOLID OXIDE FUEL-CELL SYSTEM
